item.title: Using MetalLb with Kind
item.description: Preamble: When using metallb with kind we are going to deploy it in l2-mode. This means that we need to be able to connect to the ip addresses of the node subnet. If you are using linux to host a kind cluster. You will not need to do this as the kind node ip addresses are directly attached. If you are using a Mac this tutorial may not be super useful as the way Docker Desktop works on a Mac doesn’t expose the “docker network” to the underlying host.
